name: Steel sword
description: Dabbling in a new metal, you find this one to be much sturdier and efficient than the last.

name: Perfect Sword
description: Your skill is finally perfected in terms of steelforging. This is the fruit of that labor.

name: Diamond Tipped Sword
description: A very reasonable application of diamond to a tool.

name: Diamond Sword
description: An extremely expensive sword. At least it's sharp and difficult to break.

name: Manyllyn Sword
description: After trecking through the snow, you finally create this in the High Forges, which can only be used by those who are worthy.

name: Excalibur
description: The sword of an ancient king, who long ago united the nations.
